message.content: It is difficult to provide an accurate summary of what most men in Antigua and Barbuda think of abortion as opinions on this topic can vary among individuals. However, it is worth noting that Antigua and Barbuda is a predominantly Christian country, and religious beliefs often influence attitudes towards abortion. Generally, conservative views prevail, and many men may hold pro-life perspectives, opposing abortion except in cases where the mother's life is at risk. However, it is important to recognize that there may be diverse opinions within the male population, and some individuals may hold more liberal or pro-choice views.
